    • Method Detail

      • convertToQueryMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> convertToQueryMap()
        The information of queries are extracted from each Dataiteminfo for a data center and are integrated in a map structure and returned. Each query has the information from a default request.
        Returns:
        The information of queries are extracted from each Dataiteminfo for a data center

      • convertToTrafficMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> convertToTrafficMap()
        The information of traffic are extracted from each Dataiteminfo for a data center and are integrated in a map structure and returned.
        Returns:
        The information of traffic are extracted from each Dataiteminfo for a data center

      • convertToTrafficMaps

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>>> convertToTrafficMaps()
        The information of traffic are extracted from each Dataiteminfo for all data centers and are integrated in a map structure and returned.
        Returns:
        The information of traffic are extracted from each Dataiteminfo for all data centers
